Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory85.png'}
{3: 'Alpha loses interest in Lucia when it is clear that she is no longer in any shape to fight.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'This is your last chance...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "I didn't think this would be so difficult...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Alpha's fingertips are once again charged with her power as an Ascendant, and she aims at the Narwhal's horn..."}
{3: "Alpha is about to dismiss it as Lucia's last-gasp plea, but as she turns around—"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She sees Rosetta, who is now completely corrupted and under the control of the Punishing Virus, standing up once again—'}
{3: 'As she raises her lance at the wounded Lucia, her frame scorching hot...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia will not escape her blow in her current condition.'}
{3: "Alpha gazes into the Narwhal's eyes with a hint of regret, then withdraws her Ascendant power."}
{3: 'Rosetta unleashes her lance with devastating power—'}
{3: 'In the same instant, Alpha disappears from where she was standing—'}
{3: "Lucia turns to find Rosetta's lance ripping through the space where she was as it continues flying into the distance."}
{3: 'Meanwhile, Alpha is holding onto her tightly as they fly over the snow before falling into the freezing ocean together...'}
{3: "In the depths of the quiet ocean, Lucia and Alpha gaze into each other's eyes..."}
{3: 'As soon as Lucia tries to struggle free, Alpha restrains her, and then...'}
{3: "...She leans in and whispers into Lucia's ear."}
{3: "Once again, Lucia sees that eerie smile on Alpha's face..."}
{3: 'She releases Lucia, and swims toward the surface.'}
{3: 'Back on the surface...'}
{3: 'Alpha shakes off the ice in her hair.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta, completely overwhelmed by corruption, continues searching the ice for any signs of Lucia.'}
{3: 'Behind her, the Narwhal slowly sinks into the ocean, no longer resisting. Rosetta does not pay it a single heed.'}
{3: 'Alpha sighs softly.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Still got to clean up the mess, I guess. Otherwise...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'At this moment, Alpha finally unleashes her full power—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: 'Like a shark that smells blood, Rosetta immediately turns her attention toward Alpha.'}
